track.name: Rat In Mi Kitchen
comments: I've never heard this version... (7 minutes).. it's the mad notes!
There's a rat in me kitchen i'm gonna put it in the stew...
got another bloody rat in my kitchen. bad times.
dont even like UB40 but this is sheer fun
Muy bueno
Alway screaming along with the intro, whoohoo oooh yeah
Closest I have is a gerbil in my front room
don't worry, i removed it.
shame there actually is a rat in my kitchen.
ahhh UB40 you have brought us great reggae for so very long, and this has to be my fave of all your songs!
There actually WAS a rat in our kitchen. Very uncool.
the only song I like by UB40!!
sit back roll one and toke away!!!!!!!!
Hollymonster79, that was GOOD  ha ha ha ha ha
Very good!!!!!!!!!
Im gonna cut him up

Theres a rat in my kitchen what am I gonna do?
I'm gonna FREESTYLE RAP thats what i'm gonna do!
Always loved this track!
One of my all time faves! So laid back and summery!
Sommer & Sonne & Rauchwolken !
